name: The Seaside Inn
summary:
You arrive in the small town of Cauwick Bay to help your Aunt Jody run her bed & breakfast, The Seaside Inn. It’s a place steeped in memories from your childhood, and your summer awaits.

The two people at the centre of your time in Cauwick Bay are Melani, a mermaid curious about life on land, and Taylor, a young man on the brink of deciding his future.

Both have individual romance routes, and can also be romanced together in a polyamorous route. Romance is not required, and you can befriend the characters instead.
